vw.title: My Perfect Volkswagen
vw.stripe_description: App helping people to choose the car based on their needs. There was also another project for VW after completing this one. It was called My Volkswagen and I’ve led a team of three front-end developers working on it.

esso.title: Esso
esso.stripe_description: Website for the cycling competition called Best of Belgium. This was a very short turnaround project and I have been working on it as a senior front-end developer.

freelanceri.title: Freelanceri.sk
freelanceri.stripe_description: List of Slovak freelancers working in digital media industry available for hire by agencies. I’ve co-founded the project and I was the only developer in the team. It is running on custom theme and uses custom plugin to handle random sorting of people in the list.

friedman.title: Friedman Integrated Real Estate Solutions
friedman.technologies: WordPress, PHP, MySQL, jQuery, jQuery UI, JavaScript
friedman.stripe_description: Complex corporate website for leading real estate agency based in Michigan. The site was built entirely in WordPress with a lot of custom plugins to handle search functionality, generating flyers for properties in both email and printable version, calculating available space in leased properties and more.

sachse.title: Sachse Construction
sachse.stripe_description: US based real estate agency. I’ve completely rewritten the outdated .NET codebase to WordPress. Unfortunately, the site was not redesigned and I’ve ended up only implementing responsive features to an old design.

lmb.title: Linea Mamma Baby
lmb.stripe_description: E-shop selling branded premium cosmetics for kids. I’ve build a custom WooCommerce theme that is responsive and easy to use.
